content:
The FHIR Connectathon is about testing the FHIR standard and thus we'd love to have you test the new, package-based FHIR Registry at https://registry.fhir.org for your use cases. Feedback is most welcome here: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179239-tooling/topic/The.20new.2C.20package-based.20registry.2Efhir.2Eorg

If there's strong interest I'd be happy to give an overview of the Registry and the package server / FHIR packages behind it during the connectathon.
I've added a breakout on registry.fhir.org for 11AM EST to the list (not confirmed yet).

Ward Weistra said:

I've added a breakout on registry.fhir.org for 11AM EST to the list (not confirmed yet).

Thanks Ward! I'll get that schedule and into Whova right now.
